name: NuttX esp32s3-box-3

specs.RAM: 512 KB internal SRAM, 16 MB external PSRAM

description: NuttX is a highly configurable RTOS that implements many POSIX standard interfaces for a familliar development experience and well defined boundaries between components. Espressif esp32s3-box-3 is an AIoT kit based on the esp32s3. This option creates a NuttX project for the Espressif esp32s3-box-3 based on the NuttX LVGL defconfig for esp32se-box-3 and a basic directory structure for your custom LVGL app.
shortDescription: NuttX RTOS project for esp32s3-lcd-ev board with LVGL
getStartedInstructions:
1. Install the NuttX prerequisites and KConfig frontend: `https://nuttx.apache.org/docs/latest/quickstart/install.html`.
2. Aditionally, install `unzip`.
3. Run `./setup.sh`.
4. Run `cd nuttx/`.
5. Run `make -j$(nproc) nuttx`.
6. Run `make -j$(nproc) flash ESPTOOL_PORT=/dev/ttyACM0 ESPTOOL_BINDIR=./`

settings.label: set the defconfig, patch files, and set additional configurations

actions.newContent:
echo -e '\nCFLAGS += -DLV_COLOR_16_SWAP' >> ../apps/graphics/lvgl/Makefile
mkdir -p boards/xtensa/esp32s3/esp32s3-box/src/etc/init.d/
touch boards/xtensa/esp32s3/esp32s3-box/src/etc/init.d/rcS
echo -e '\nmy_lvgl_app &' >> boards/xtensa/esp32s3/esp32s3-box/src/etc/init.d/rc.sysinit
echo -e '\nRCSRCS = etc/init.d/rc.sysinit etc/init.d/rcS' >> boards/xtensa/esp32s3/esp32s3-box/src/Make.defs
./tools/configure.sh -l esp32s3-box:lvgl-3
kconfig-tweak --enable CONFIG_FS_ROMFS
kconfig-tweak --enable CONFIG_ETC_ROMFS
